sentence1.text: I am an amateur photographer and here is a piece of advise to all the folks who are thinking about making a move the digital world .

aspects.clause1: I am an amateur photographer and here is a piece of advise to all the folks who are thinking about making a move the digital world .

sentence2.text: Nikon 4300 , i feel , is the best camera out there for the features and price .

aspects.clause1: Nikon 4300 is the best camera out there for the features and price .

sentence3.text: Here were my requirements in a digital camera :

aspects.clause1: Here were my requirements in a digital camera :

sentence4.text: 1 . I had initially thought of buying a 2 or 3 megapixel camera but these are good for 4x6 " or 5x7 " prints and i wanted some really great 8x10 " photos once in a while .

aspects.clause1: and I wanted some really great 8x10" photos once in a while

sentence5.text: 2 . I did not want a very small camera as it seems to get lost in my hands and i was n't comfortable with that .

aspects.clause1: I did not want a very small camera as it seems to get lost in my hands and I wasn't comfortable with that .

sentence6.text: I wanted a decent sized camera with a contour for my fingers to hold it steadily.

aspects.clause1: I wanted a decent sized camera with a contour for my fingers to hold it steadily.

sentence7.text: 3 . I wanted a camera that had a lot of built-in settings for different types of suroundings while giving me an option to use my photography skills although , i am an amateur with an interest in photography by turning on the manual settings .

aspects.clause1: while giving me an option to use my photography skills by turning on the manual settings .

sentence8.text: 4 . And , of course , i wanted a respected brand and had to stay within my budget because i had bought an expensive camcorder before but had n't used it much .

aspects.clause1: because I had bought an expensive camcorder before but hadn't used it much

sentence9.text: Depending on all the above requirements , i had narrowed down my search to nikon 4300 and canon powershot s400 models .

aspects.clause1: Depending on all the above requirements, I had narrowed down my search to Nikon 4300 and Canon Powershot S400 models .

aspects.clause1: The daylight pictures are brilliant
aspects.clause2: the indoor shots are very good

sentence6.text: The shutter lag is on par with what i 've experienced with point and shoot 35mm and aps film cameras and the next frame advance is about a couple seconds using a high speed 12x 128mb compact flash card a salesperson recommended the high speed card since next frame advance speed was important to me - and it was only a few dollars more .

aspects.clause2: the next frame advance is about a couple seconds

sentence7.text: Uploading the images to my windows-based pc is very fast and simple .

sentence8.text: The only drawbacks I've encountered are : 1. indoor shots from a distance > 8ft lack contrast and color , but I've found this to be a problem with all cameras with built-in flashes that i 've used even on a nikon slr .

sentence9.text: Right now , i 'm researching for an inexpensive slave flash unit that 's designed for digital cameras .

aspects.clause1: this camera is great !

sentence5.text: The picture quality is amazing and you can connect it to your tv and could make silent movies that way if you wanted to .

aspects.clause1: The picture quality is amazing and you can connect it to your tv and could make silent movies that way if you wanted to
aspects.clause2: The picture quality is amazing and you can connect it to your tv and could make silent movies that way if you wanted to

sentence6.text: I can't connect it to my computer though , but that 's a problem with windows me , not the camera .

aspects.clause1: I can't connect it to my computer though , but that 's a problem with windows me , not the camera

sentence7.text: If you have windows me you should upgrade to xp anyway , lol .

aspects.clause1: If you have windows me you should upgrade to xp anyway , lol

sentence8.text: But it works perfectly fine on my parent 's computer .

aspects.clause1: But it works perfectly fine on my parent's computer

sentence9.text: It does have a lense cap , but it wo n't let you take pics with it on which is real good .

aspects.clause1: It does have a lense cap , but it wo n't let you take pics with it on which is real good

sentence10.text: The battery recharges real fast and the recharger thingy that comes with is real nice .

aspects.clause1: The battery recharges real fast and the recharger thingy that comes with is real nice

sentence11.text: Ooh , and i dropped it and it still works fine : this little camera has so many features i have n't even gotten to all of them yet .

aspects.clause1: this little camera has so many features i have n't even gotten to all of them yet

sentence1.text: I did quite a bit of research before buying this camera , and this one had everything i was looking for .

aspects.clause1: this one had everything i was looking for

sentence2.text: It's easy for beginners to use , but has features that more serious photographers will love , so it 's an excellent camera to grow into .

aspects.clause1: It's easy for beginners to use
aspects.clause2: has features that more serious photographers will love

sentence3.text: It's light weight enough to take with you everywhere , but powerful enough to get outstanding pix .

aspects.clause1: It's light weight enough to take with you everywhere
aspects.clause2: powerful enough to get outstanding pix

sentence4.text: I love the continuous shot mode , which allows you to take up to 16 pix in rapid succession -- great for action shots .

aspects.clause1: I love the continuous shot mode

sentence5.text: I'm amazed at the photo quality -- prints are indistinguishable from 35mm prints .

aspects.clause1: I'm amazed at the photo quality

sentence6.text: I only have one complaint , and that is the 8mb card included .

aspects.clause1: I only have one complaint, and that is the 8mb card included

sentence7.text: 8mb for a camera like this is a joke .

aspects.clause1: 8mb for a camera like this is a joke

sentence8.text: A card with more memory is a must .

aspects.clause1: A card with more memory is a must

sentence9.text: A minor quibble , since most cameras on the market still only include the 8mb cards .

aspects.clause1: A minor quibble, since most cameras on the market still only include the 8mb cards

sentence1.text: If you do any research into digital cameras , you 'll quickly find that this camera is just about the best value out there .

aspects.clause1: this camera is just about the best value out there

sentence2.text: These are the reasons i think it 's great :

aspects.clause1: These are the reasons i think it 's great

sentence3.text: 1. It has all the features an amatuer photo-enthusiast would want .

aspects.clause1: It has all the features an amateur photo-enthusiast would want

sentence4.text: 2. It is easy enough for my grandmother to use .

aspects.clause1: It is easy enough for my grandmother to use

sentence5.text: 3. It is very compact but the controls are so well designed that they 're still easy to use .

aspects.clause1: It is very compact but the controls are so well designed that they're still easy to use

sentence6.text: 4. It has optional lenses like wide angles and extra zooms .

aspects.clause1: It has optional lenses like wide angles and extra zooms

sentence7.text: 5. For " digital film " it uses compact flash cards , which are easy to find , cheap , reliable and supported by many other devices you may have at hoome .

aspects.clause1: it uses compact flash cards, which are easy to find, cheap, reliable and supported by many other devices you may have at home

sentence8.text: 6. The nikon coolpix line is a well-established line so you know support and parts are going to be available even when nikon releases a newer model .

aspects.clause1: The nikon coolpix line is a well-established line so you know support and parts are going to be available
Picture quality is excellent
Battery life is excellent

sentence11.text: 9. 3x built-in optical zoom is a lot for this price range .

aspects.clause1: 3x built-in optical zoom is a lot for this price range

sentence12.text: 10. Great price for all the features .

aspects.clause1: Great price for all the features

sentence13.text: Here's what you may miss or be annoyed by with this camera :

aspects.clause1: Here's what you may miss or be annoyed by with this camera

sentence14.text: 1. No direct firewire to the camera .

aspects.clause1: No direct firewire to the camera
There is usb, though

sentence16.text: 2. The camera is so small that when you attach some lenses i have the 19mm wide-angle -- wc-e 68 , the optical viewfinder is partially obscured .

aspects.clause1: The camera is so small that when you attach some lenses the optical viewfinder is partially obscured

sentence17.text: This doesn't affect the picture , of course .

sentence18.text: You just have to use the lcd viewfinder to see the whole picture .

aspects.clause1: You just have to use the lcd viewfinder to see the whole picture .

sentence19.text: It's no problem for me personally .

aspects.clause1: It's no problem for me personally

sentence20.text: 3. Battery has to be removed to recharge .

aspects.clause1: Battery has to be removed to recharge .

sentence21.text: 4. An ac adapter for powering the camera while the battery 's out is not included , although one can be purchased separately .

aspects.clause1: An ac adapter for powering the camera while the battery's out is not included

sentence22.text: 5. Two different adapters -- ur-e 4 and ur-e 7 -- are required for some attachment lenses .

aspects.clause1: Two different adapters -- ur-e 4 and ur-e 7 -- are required for some attachment lenses

sentence23.text: Most of these " annoyances " , though , are comparable to what you 'll find on other cameras in this price range .

aspects.clause1: Most of these 'annoyances', though, are comparable to what you'll find on other cameras in this price range

sentence1.text: I am new to the whole digital camera thing ; well , new to the whole camera thing period , really .

aspects.clause1: I am new to the whole digital camera thing; well, new to the whole camera thing period, really.

sentence2.text: This camera was affordable , very easy to learn , and produces spectacular images .

aspects.clause1: This camera was affordable, very easy to learn, and produces spectacular images.

sentence3.text: The auto-mode is good enough for most shots but the 4300 also boasts 12 versatile scene modes as well as a manual mode though i admit i have n't played with it too much on manual .

aspects.clause1: The auto-mode is good enough for most shots
aspects.clause2: the 4300 also boasts 12 versatile scene modes
aspects.clause3: though I admit I haven't played with it too much on manual.

sentence4.text: It 's size also makes it ideal for travel .

aspects.clause1: It's size also makes it ideal for travel.

sentence5.text: Overall the nikon 4300 is a very dependable , robust , and useful little camera .

aspects.clause1: Overall the nikon 4300 is a very dependable, robust, and useful little camera.

sentence1.text: Awesome camera with huge print quality in a tiny package .

aspects.clause1: Awesome camera with huge print quality in a tiny package

sentence2.text: The same 4mp chip from the 4500 camera , plus a 3x zoom with the ability to expand upon that with extenders , great closeup mode , long lasting recheargable battery , etc etc.

aspects.clause1: The same 4mp chip from the 4500 camera
aspects.clause2: plus a 3x zoom with the ability to expand upon that with extenders
aspects.clause3: great close-up mode

sentence3.text: In my opinion it 's the best camera for the money if you 're looking for something that 's easy to use , small good for travel , and provides excellent , sharp images .

aspects.clause1: it's the best camera for the money
aspects.clause2: if you're looking for something that's easy to use
aspects.clause3: small good for travel
